briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate Efficacy and Safety of Lifitegrast in Subjects With Dry Eye (OPUS-3)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-masked, and Placebo-controlled Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of a 5.0% Concentration of Lifitegrast Ophthalmic Solution Compared to Placebo in Subjects With Dry Eye Disease and History of Recent Artificial Tear Use
summary: Evaluate the efficacy and safety of Lifitegrast in subjects with dry eye disease and a recent history of artificial tear use.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Patient-Reported Eye Dryness Score to Day 84
